title: Trump allows more tariff-free beef from Argentina as prices spike
shortDescription: Trump signed a proclamation that allows an additional 80,000 metric tons of Argentinian beef to be imported tariff-free to the U.S. annually.

title: Unredacted Epstein files will open to Congress on Feb. 9, DOJ says
shortDescription: Congress can begin reviewing unredacted versions of Epstein files released by the DOJ starting Feb. 9, according to a letter obtained by USA TODAY.

title: Trump posts on social media run the gamut from politics to garbage
shortDescription: One post on Trump's social media set off a firestorm but the president posted scores of messages covering a wide range of political and social topics.

title: Donald Trump's 'softer' approach ends with 'racist' Obama ape video
shortDescription: President Trump sent well wishes to Savannah Guthrie and promised a "softer" immigration approach. Then came the video depicting the Obamas as apes.

title: ¿Qué mostraba el video de Trump sobre Obama? Desata críticas por racismo
shortDescription: Trump compartió un video racista con imágenes de los Obama y teorías falsas de fraude, generando condenas bipartidistas y renovando el debate sobre desinformación.

title: Trump shared Obama ape video. Here's the dark history behind the imagery.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's Truth Social account shared, then deleted, a video depicting Barack and Michelle Obama as apes. Why is that imagery considered racist?

title: Trump pushes Penn Station, Dulles airport renaming
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reportedly told Sen. Chuck Schumer he'd drop a hold on federal funds if Schumer renamed Penn Station and Dulles airport.

title: Sen. Tim Scott calls Trump's post depicting Obamas as apes 'racist'
shortDescription: The Republican senator's comments on Trump's post are a departure for Scott, the longest-serving Black senator in American history.

title: Trump pushed to have Penn Station, Dulles airport named after him
shortDescription: Trump offered to restore funding to the country's biggest infrastructure project in exchange for some big naming rights, Reuters reported.

title: Trump shares video that shows Obamas as apes
shortDescription: President Donald Trump shared a video on Truth Social that depicts former President Barack Obama and former first lady Michelle Obama as apes.

title: Trump’s repeated claims of election fraud in 2020 have proven false
shortDescription: Legal experts have questioned the motivation for the FBI's recent seizure of election documents in Georgia, which President Donald Trump lost in 2020.

title: Trump’s repeated claims of election fraud in 2020 have proven false | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Legal experts have questioned the motivation for the FBI's recent seizure of election documents in Georgia, which President Donald Trump lost in 2020.

title: Trump posts, deletes video meme of Barack and Michelle Obama as apes
shortDescription: The White House criticized "fake outrage" over Trump's post of former President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama before later removing the post.

title: Trump's discount drug site is officially live
shortDescription: President Donald Trump officially launched a new government website, TrumpRx, aimed at helping Americans buy medicines at lower prices.

title: Trump to pick Kid Rock halftime over Bad Bunny
shortDescription: The White House expects President Donald Trump's Super Bowl party to skip the Bad Bunny halftime show, said Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt.

title: Will Trump renew treaty with Russia that limits nukes? Here's his plan.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he plans to let a treaty that's limited how many nuclear weapons the US and Russia can maintain expire.

title: Mar-a-Lago is 'more than a home,' Melania Trump says in documentary
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump's doc shows her in NYC and in Mar-a-Lago. She called the Florida estate 'more than a home.' Does she live at the White House?

title: White House rebuffs Steve Bannon's plan to send ICE to polling sites
shortDescription: President Trump has not discussed Steve Bannon's idea to dispatch ICE agents to polling sites during the 2026 midterm election, the White House said.

title: Trump attorney leaves MN, says 'this job sucks' amid immigration cases
shortDescription: 'I work days and night just because people (are) still in there," Julie Le, an attorney with DHS said. 'The system sucks. This job sucks.'

title: White House: Guthrie disappearance 'heartbreaking'
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said President Trump called Savannah Guthrie about the disappearance of her mother, Nancy Guthrie.

title: Trump endorses former MLB All-Star for Congress in Texas
shortDescription: With congressional elections happening later this year, President Trump is endorsing candidates, including former MBL star Mark Teixeira.
